abstract: Report by aid group Save the Children describes desperate measures Syrians in besieged areas of country are resorting to for survival, including eating animal feed and leaves; at least quarter-million children reside in such areas.

headline.print_headline: Eating Leaves, and Other Ways Besieged Syrians Try to Survive
headline.main: Eating Leaves, and Other Ways Besieged Syrians Try to Survive

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The report detailed how civilians in 18 areas across the country are forced to scrounge to survive.
lead_paragraph: The report detailed how civilians in 18 areas across the country are forced to scrounge to survive.
